metadata.title: CVE-2018-19964 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen 4.11.x allowing x86 guest OS users to causea denial of service (host OS hang) because the p2m lock remains unavailableindefinitely in certain error conditions.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
